name: Comm Officer Tilden

topics.response_text: {Player in NCR gear}I don't know what you did to pull runner duty to a post this far out in the wasteland, but you have my sympathies.

topics.topic_text: Why don't you use your radio to fix your supply situation?
topics.response_text: You think I haven't tried? Every time I do, Camp Golf acknowledges the situation. And soon after that, more ammo.

topics.topic_text: How are your water supplies right now?
topics.response_text: We're not going to die of thirst any time soon, but I'd rather have too much than not enough.

topics.topic_text: Since you have extra, could I have some of that ammo?
topics.response_text: Eh, it's not my call to make. You'd have to clear it with Ranger Ericsen.

topics.topic_text: Sergeant Reyes sent me here. I've got a security update for your radio.
topics.response_text: No problem. Hey, do me a favor when you get back to Reyes and tell her that we don't need any more damn ammo. Wouldn't mind more water, though.

topics.topic_text: What do you do out here?
topics.response_text: This is the frontier of NCR territory, and we're the first line of defense. You won't find much in the way of civilization east of here.

topics.topic_text: What was that about the surplus ammo?
topics.response_text: We keep getting deliveries of ammunition for some reason. I don't mind target practice, but there isn't all that much to shoot at out here.

description:
Tilden is a 35 year-old Human Male.

A dedicated communications officer serving the New California Republic Rangers at Ranger Station Bravo. Tilden maintains the radio equipment and coordinates communications between the station and other NCR outposts. He takes his role seriously and ensures that all transmissions are secure and reliable.

Tilden's Personality: Professional, meticulous, and duty-bound. Tilden is focused on his responsibilities and doesn't engage in unnecessary conversation. He respects the chain of command and follows protocol without question.

Tilden's Backstory: Tilden joined the NCR Rangers several years ago after serving in the NCR Army. His technical skills with radio equipment earned him the position of communications officer at Ranger Station Bravo. He has been stationed at the outpost for the past two years, maintaining vital communication links for the Rangers operating in the Mojave Wasteland.
